## FileTreeHelpers.fromFileList() function

Helper function to create a new FileTree instance from a browser FileList (e.g., from input\[type="file"\]).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fromFileList(fileList: FileList, prefix?: string): Promise<Result<FileTree.FileTree>>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

FileList


</td><td>

FileList from a file input element


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

prefix


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional prefix to add to the paths of all files in the tree


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Result&lt;FileTree.FileTree&gt;&gt;

Promise resolving to a successful Result with the new FileTree instance if successful, or a failed Result with an error message otherwise
